title: Ornn and exclusive Forgemaster icon available now

replies.body: Please stop waste time and money on designing ugly champions, we need beautiful female champions!!  otherwise, my girl friend will uninstall LOL
Cmon man we need more diversity
When is Ornn gonna be 6300ip? I want to buy him nowwww
I c where Riot is going with this. Every time they release a new champ they will let u get icons for these if u purchase them and complete missions in time.
